channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- ClearQuest
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- ClearQuest

item.title: CVE-2024-28796|2024-08-02T00:56:58.414Z -- ibm -- clearquest
item.description: IBM ClearQuest (CQ) 9.1 through 9.1.0.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 286833.
